name: CSE COE
membership: Only as individual experts - members in ACCA, IIA, ISACA
goal: To provide consulting services to public institutions in Central and Eastern Europe and to participate in EU wide studies, for instance, the Council of Europe, DG MOVE, the European Medicines Agency, EIB. To provide consulting services to pre-accession countries
interests: Business and Industry, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Project Manager for DG MOVE study on North Sea - Baltic Core Network Corridor - 2nd and 3rd phase
Internal audit external assessment of the Council of Europe and the European Medicines Agency
Project completion reports for EIB
Public services improvement in Albania
Latvia - Russia cross-border programme expenditure evaluation.

Review of e-health system functionality in Latvia.
